name: cap
description: The privacy-first, self-hosted CAPTCHA for the modern web.
readme_summary: Cap is a privacy-first, self-hosted CAPTCHA alternative that replaces traditional visual challenges with a lightweight, JavaScript-based proof-of-work system. It aims to be fast, dependency-free, and easily integrable into modern web applications, offering a more accessible and private user experience.
primary_use_case: To provide a modern, privacy-preserving, and user-friendly alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems for websites and APIs, preventing bots and abuse without requiring users to solve visual puzzles.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly, stylized robot with a glowing, intricate lock mechanism on its chest, effortlessly allowing a stream of diverse, happy human avatars to pass through a digital gate. Behind the gate, a serene, clean digital landscape unfolds, symbolizing a protected website. The robot is subtly holding a small, glowing 'Cap' logo. The scene is rendered in a clean, 3D isometric illustration style with a bright, optimistic color palette, emphasizing ease of access and security. Small, abstract data particles flow around the robot, hinting at the underlying proof-of-work without being overly technical.

name: dtop
description: Terminal dashboard for Docker monitoring across multiple hosts with Dozzle integration.
readme_summary: dtop is a terminal-based dashboard for real-time Docker container monitoring across multiple hosts. It provides instant visibility into container status, resource usage, and key metrics directly in the command line, with integration for viewing container logs via Dozzle.
primary_use_case: Monitoring Docker containers across multiple hosts directly from the terminal.
cover_image_prompt: A vigilant lighthouse keeper standing at the top of a lighthouse, using a powerful telescope to scan a vast ocean filled with numerous ships (representing Docker containers). The telescope's beam highlights ships with glowing red icons (indicating issues) and green icons (indicating healthy status). Below the lighthouse, a detailed dashboard displays real-time metrics and logs. Subtle digital particles flow from the telescope to the dashboard. The scene is set at dusk with a dramatic, clear sky, emphasizing the lighthouse's role in providing visibility and control. The repository name 'dtop' is subtly etched into the lighthouse base. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with clear outlines and a focus on the metaphor of centralized monitoring and control.

name: ytconverter
description: The ytconverter is a CLI tool for downloading YouTube videos in various format directly from the terminal. It leverages popular libraries (yt-dlp) and frameworks within the Python ecosystem to handle video downloading, format conversion, metadata handling and many more!
readme_summary: YTConverter is a Python-based CLI tool for downloading and converting YouTube videos. It leverages yt-dlp and ffmpeg to offer features like format conversion, subtitle downloads, playlist support, and customizable download paths, all through an interactive terminal interface.
primary_use_case: Downloading and converting YouTube videos from the command line.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly robot assistant with a cheerful expression, standing in a clean, modern terminal environment. The robot is holding a YouTube play button icon in one hand and a stack of diverse media files (MP3, MP4, SRT) in the other, with a subtle glow emanating from the transformation process. Small, stylized icons representing video quality, format conversion, and subtitle downloads float around the robot. The repository name 'YTConverter' is subtly integrated into the terminal's interface. The overall scene is a 3D isometric illustration with a bright, inviting color palette, emphasizing ease of use and functionality.

name: Dorion
description: Tiny alternative Discord client with a smaller footprint, snappier startup, themes, plugins and more!
readme_summary: Dorion is a lightweight, alternative Discord client built with Rust and Tauri, designed for lower-spec or storage-constrained PCs. It offers a snappier experience and supports customization through themes and plugins.
primary_use_case: To provide a more performant and customizable Discord experience on less powerful hardware.
cover_image_prompt: A miniature, sleek, and efficient digital messenger bird, crafted from polished chrome and glowing circuits, delivering a vibrant message packet. The bird is shown mid-flight, leaving a subtle trail of light particles, symbolizing speed and low resource usage. In the background, a stylized, minimalist cityscape represents the digital world, with the bird easily navigating through it. Small, almost imperceptible UI elements resembling chat bubbles and plugin icons are subtly integrated into the bird's design. The overall mood is bright and optimistic, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The image should be a 3D isometric illustration with a focus on clarity and a cool color palette.
